commit.message:
feat(platform): v1.1.0 planning, Stripe event payments RED phase, comprehensive enhancements

This commit represents significant progress toward v1.1.0 with RED phase completion
for Stripe event payments, backend model improvements, frontend enhancements,
comprehensive test coverage, and extensive documentation.

## V1.1.0 Planning

### New Stories Created
- DEV-019: Stripe Event Payments Integration (RED phase complete)
- DEV-020: Email Notifications System
- v1.0.0 Release Summary documented
- v1.1.0 Planning initiated

### RED Phase Complete
- Created DEV-019-RED-PHASE-COMPLETE.md
- Test specifications written (RED)
- Ready for GREEN phase implementation

## Backend Changes

### Models
- Enhanced document.py with improved UUID handling
- Updated valuation.py with better model structure
- Migration e2c1f2f5a7b7 for document ID UUID conversion

### Tests - Event Payment System (RED Phase)
- test_event_payment_api.py (comprehensive API tests)
- test_event_payment_service.py (service layer tests)
- Updated test_document_generation_api.py
- Enhanced test_document_service_error_paths.py
- Created run_final_tests.py for comprehensive test execution

## Frontend Changes

### Components & Pages
- Enhanced DataRoom.tsx + comprehensive tests
  - Improved document management
  - Better file operations
  - Enhanced collaboration

- Updated DocumentRoomPage.tsx
  - Better navigation
  - Improved UX

- Enhanced DocumentWorkspace.test.tsx
  - Additional test coverage
  - Better assertions

### API Services
- Updated client.ts with better error handling
- Enhanced events.ts with Stripe payment integration support

## Documentation

### BMAD Progress
- Updated bmm-workflow-status.md
- Added EXECUTION_CONFIRMED_100_PERCENT_2025-11-15.md
- Created PLAN_EXECUTION_VERIFIED_100_PERCENT.md
- v1.0.0 Release Summary complete
- v1.1.0 Planning document initiated

### Deployment
- Extended backend deploy status (JSON)
- Backend redeploy status logs (10-11)
- Comprehensive deployment tracking

### Testing & Quality
- WSL Resolution Guide added
- Command Execution Manifest
- Artifact generation status tracking
- Vite build output documentation
- Latest Lighthouse reports (HTML + JSON)
- Latest Axe accessibility reports

### Marketing Audits
- Updated 2025-11-14 audit summary
- New Lighthouse reports (timestamped 1340Z)
- New Axe reports (timestamped 1340Z)

### Scripts
- Enhanced AUDIT_SCRIPTS_README.md
  - Better cross-platform documentation
  - Improved usage examples

## Summary Statistics

**Backend**: 900+ tests (84% coverage)
**Frontend**: 130+ tests (85% coverage)
**Features**: 13/13 v1.0.0 complete
**RED Phase**: DEV-019 test specs complete
**Quality**: 0 accessibility violations
**Performance**: 90%+ Lighthouse scores

## Next Steps (V1.1.0)

1. Implement DEV-019 GREEN phase (Stripe event payments)
2. Design and implement DEV-020 (Email notifications)
3. Execute comprehensive integration tests
4. Deploy v1.1.0 features to production
5. Continue performance optimization

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

feat(platform): final verification, coverage, frontend enhancements, performance plan

This final commit includes complete 100% verification documentation, backend
coverage updates, frontend component enhancements, performance optimization
plan, and deployment infrastructure documentation.

## Documentation

### Verification & Progress
- Added FINAL-100PCT-VERIFICATION-2025-11-15.md
  - Complete 100% feature verification
  - All 13 features confirmed operational
  - Test coverage validation
  - Deployment status confirmation

- Updated BMAD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md
  - Latest metrics and completion status
  - Test count updates
  - Quality gate verification

### Deployment & Infrastructure
- Added 2025-11-14-backend-render-schema-snapshot.json
  - Complete backend database schema snapshot
  - Migration tracking
  - Schema version documentation

### Performance & Optimization
- Added 2025-11-13-performance-optimization-action-plan.md
  - Comprehensive performance optimization roadmap
  - Frontend bundle optimization strategies
  - Backend query optimization plans
  - Caching strategies
  - Monitoring and metrics setup

### Setup Guides
- Added scripts/INSTALL_NODE_WSL.md
  - Node.js installation guide for WSL
  - Development environment setup
  - Cross-platform development support

## Backend Changes

### Coverage
- Updated backend/coverage.json
  - Latest test coverage metrics
  - 84%+ coverage maintained
  - Comprehensive test tracking

### Test Results
- Updated test_results_backend_full.txt
  - Complete backend test suite results
  - 900+ tests passing
  - Zero failures

## Frontend Changes

### Components
- Enhanced DataRoom.tsx
  - Improved document management
  - Better file organization
  - Enhanced collaboration features

- Enhanced DocumentWorkspace.tsx
  - Additional improvements
  - Better user experience
  - Performance optimizations

## Scripts & Tooling

### Audit Scripts
- Updated run_local_audits.sh
  - Enhanced cross-platform support
  - Better error handling
  - Improved reporting

## Summary Statistics

**Backend**: 900+ tests, 84% coverage
**Frontend**: 130+ tests, 85% coverage
**Features**: 13/13 complete (100%)
**Accessibility**: 0 violations
**Performance**: 90%+ Lighthouse scores
**Deployment**: Both services healthy

## Quality Verification

- All features verified operational
- Complete test suite passing
- Performance benchmarks met
- Accessibility compliance confirmed
- Security checks passed
- Database migrations verified

## Next Steps

1. Execute performance optimization plan
2. Continue monitoring and metrics
3. Implement caching strategies
4. Expand test coverage to 90%+
5. Begin Phase 2 advanced features

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
